textAfterTable: In three sentences It is a great way to get a jump start to your college education. It's location is usually fairly convenient to those around Parkersburg. The staff here are very friendly, and you can almost guarantee that you will end up with at least 1 professor who you love! Login to rate or flag the reviews Melissa from Davisville, WV 05/27/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 15 Categories Comments In three sentences WVUP is a great place for students who have been out of school for a while. The flexible schedule allows me to take care of my kids and work without any problem. The small classrooms are great too!
